law.catch_line: In this subtitle, "licensed wholesaler" means a wholesaler who is licensed under Title 16, Subtitle ...
law.text: In this subtitle, "licensed wholesaler" means a wholesaler who is licensed under Title 16, Subtitle 2 of the Business Regulation Article to act as a wholesaler or under Title 16.5, Subtitle 2 of the Business Regulation Article to act as an other tobacco products wholesaler.
